markdownRemark.excerpt: The screen printing process can be achieved with a cheap screen off Amazon and a good bit of sunshine but I like procedure and crispness so I found a textileâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
The screen printing process can be achieved with a cheap screen off Amazon and a good bit of sunshine but I like procedure and crispness so I found a textile studio with a dark room and exposure unit that was open to renting under the supervision of an artistic fellow.

For the sort of designs I was working on mesh count could've ranged from 110 - 170, I used a screen with a mesh count of 156. I treated the screen with a light sensitive emulsion. Exposure time based on the specifications of the unit and design size was 60 seconds.

frontmatter.title: The Time I Became a Designer and Artist
frontmatter.description: Woke up one day with an idea for a tote bag, realized I would never find it in the real world, decided to design and make it for myself.
